com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates

Class CampaignDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates.AbstractBaseDelegate<S>
      • com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates.AbstractGetDelegate<T,S>
        • com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates.AbstractGetMutateDelegate<com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201506.cm.Campaign,com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201506.cm.CampaignOperation,com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201506.cm.CampaignServiceInterface>
          • com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.utility.extension.delegates.CampaignDelegate

  • public final class CampaignDelegate
extends AbstractGetMutateDelegate<com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201506.cm.Campaign,com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201506.cm.CampaignOperation,com.google.api.ads.adwords.axis.v201506.cm.CampaignServiceInterface>
    Specific AbstractGetMutateDelegate for Campaign.

    Implementation is not thread-safe, because AdWordsSession and Apache Axis service objects are not thread-safe.
